Dialogues.Sentance: During the year 1798, in the city of Mulhouse, tension is building between two camps in the city, the first one who want to claim the independance of the city and the second one who want to form an alliance with France for economic reason.
To avoid a civil war, the two chief of the both sides take a descision, create a competition between fields of activity. You are a member of the group who need to help the tanner.
You have joined the group calling for the unification of Mulhouse.
At the end, the best team will be able to take the final descision for the mulhouse’s city.
Tanner : Hello, do you know why i call you here ? I am the chief of the tanner of our group.
You : Yes. You need my help to convince the tanners to join us.
Tanner : Exactly, your first mission is to go to the bar and help set the mood.
You : Why do we need to set the mood in a bar, are we not suposed to help the tanner ?
Tanenr : Yes, of course, but you know to treat their product they need urine so we are gonna search some at the bar, for the tanner this liquid is gold.
You : Ok, im going to the bar.
Tanner : Oh.. and be carefull, some bandit from the other camp hang around the bar.
Barman : Hey ! Are you the one who's been called in to help me ?
You : Yes, it's me. So.. what should i do ?
Barman : You'll have to animate the evening with music, and the better you are, the more people will drink !
Barman : So get the chords and notes right (by turning your phone) and avoid the drunks to win !
You : Ok, i'll do it.
Barman : Thank you again ! Good luck.
Barman : Nice job, now, you can bring the barrels to the Tanner ! My cart is at  «La cours des chaines».
Farmer : Hi, the cart's here, take car for the enemies on your road. To avoid them, turn your phone as the last game
Farmer : You need to walk now. Bring the barrel to the tanner. keep your phone in front of you, straight, and move it so that the barrel is upright, don't move too fast, it could fall.
Tanner : Well done, you've done it !
Tanner : Thanks to you, the town of Mulhouse will be much more likely to listen to our side! You've won !
The end.
